column5: A place to call home. Centrally located in Arlington, Texas in a cozy, quiet neighborhood. A great location with easy access to restaurants, shopping, entertainment and night life. Has a large backyard with grill and plenty of space to entertain.  Rangers Ballpark - 10m (2.8 mi) AT&T Stadium - 10m (2.4 mi) University of Texas Arlington - 7m (1.9 mi) Six Flags - 12m (5.4 mi) Fort Worth - 26m (17 mi) Dallas - 26m (20 mi)
